question: Tennis matches can't end in a tie; there must always be a winner.
The highest possible score in a single game of bowling is 300.
A 'birdie' in golf means scoring one stroke under par on a hole.
Cycling's Tour de France is an annual event that lasts for two weeks.
A 'clean sheet' in soccer means a team didn't concede any goals during a match.
A baseball game can end in a tie if neither team scores after extra innings.
In basketball, a slam dunk is worth three points.
In Olympic diving, a perfect score is 10 from each judge.
A triathlon consists of three consecutive events: swimming, cycling, and running.
The 'offside' rule in soccer only applies to offensive players.
